hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #2# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Green Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Mido's house#.

GV (Waterfall).text: Are you stuck? Try asking for help in our Discord server or check out our Wiki!

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that tossing a bomb will cause a Blue Bubble to go after it.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Requiem of Spirit#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Purple Rupee#.
